description:
Fuwa Haruto is another novelist who debuted around the same time as http://anidb.net/ch90513 [Itsuki]. His light novel series is getting an anime adaptation. Despite his cool appearance, he loves maid characters and owns a lot of adult games and figurines. Haruto has a "persona" in his social media to gain fans for his novel series` popularity. He has a younger sister whom he thought is harsh to him, but is actually a sister who can not be honest.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Fuwa Haruto
